Subinterfaces of ConversationManager in com.google.code.rees.scope.conversation.processing

          Implementations of this class should implement injection of ConversationFields
 

Classes in com.google.code.rees.scope.conversation.processing that implement ConversationManager
 class DefaultInjectionConversationManager
          The default implementation of the InjectionConversationManager
 class SimpleConversationManager
          A simple yet effective implementation of ConversationManager that manages conversation life cycles, but does not inject ConversationFields.
